Question regaerding system pages.(search page which uses html/coded template)
 how long does it take for the changes on the header menu (global module for menu items) take effect?
seems to take too long for the changes to show up on system pages? or is this a bug?

One time I discovered something similar. The global menu change won't take effect. I had to republish the menu and then it worked. Normally it won't take longer than a view seconds, up to a minute to compile the changes to all live pages. But you can speed it up, by republish the system page manually, or use the preview to see the changes directly.
Make sure you picked the right one. Sometimes there ware two or more menus: one for mobile, the other for desktop and maybe a breadcrumb one.
yes same as you have stated! thanks for confirming.
